# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high value and quality, it's worth $10000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at an exclusive price of $9500. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive exceptional value while allowing me to appreciate the product's worth. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
